p: Fig. 2 shows the plot of predictions for COVID-19 confirmed cases in the United States of America. Fig. 3 shows the plot of predictions for COVID-19 deaths in United States of America. The United States had different lockdown and phased reopening strategies for the various states [40]. Predictions on cases indicate the cumulative cases are still increasing. The actual COVID-19 cases are also rising. The predictions for deaths have a flattening trend. The trends indicate more mitigation measures may be needed.
